mapper.select: SELECT v.id, v.vindex, v.vname, v.thumbnail_url, v.description, v.thumbnail_url, v.video_url, v.price, vb.`status` FROM video v LEFT JOIN video_buy_record vb ON v.`id` = vb.`video_id` AND customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY v.id DESC LIMIT #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}
SELECT v.id, v.vindex, v.vname, v.description, v.thumbnail_url, v.video_url, v.price FROM video v WHERE v.id in (${ids});

SELECT v.id, v.vindex, v.vname, v.description, v.thumbnail_url, v.video_url, v.price, vb.`status`, IFNULL(vr.current_minute,"0") AS current_minute FROM video v LEFT JOIN video_buy_record vb ON v.`id` = vb.`video_id` AND vb.customer_id = #{customerId} LEFT JOIN video_record vr ON v.`id`=vr.`video_id` AND vr.`customer_id`=#{customerId} WHERE v.id = #{videoId}
SELECT v.id, v.vindex, v.vname, v.description, v.thumbnail_url, v.video_url, v.price FROM video v where v.id = #{videoId}
SELECT * FROM video_buy_record WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} AND video_id = #{videoId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video_buy_record (video_id, customer_id, order_number, coment, `status`) VALUES (#{videoBuyRecord.video.id}, #{videoBuyRecord.customer.id}, #{videoBuyRecord.orderNumber}, #{videoBuyRecord.coment}, #{videoBuyRecord.status})
mapper.update: UPDATE video_buy_record SET `status` = #{videoBuyRecord.status}, submit_time = NOW() WHERE customer_id = #{videoBuyRecord.customer.id} AND id = #{videoBuyRecord.id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM video WHERE id in (${ids})
mapper.update: UPDATE video SET vindex=#{vindex}, vname=#{vname}, description=#{description}, video_url=#{videoUrl}, thumbnail_url=#{thumbnailUrl}, price=#{price} WHERE id=#{id}
